articles.title: How Fran Drescher's dog changed her life after horrifying attack - Page Six
articles.description: “I am often amazed by how much more relaxed I am walking down the streets … because I am with my friend, companion and protector,” the “Nanny” star said.
articles.content:
Fran Drescher says her service dog changed her life after she was raped at gunpoint nearly 40 years ago.
Two men broke into the “Nanny” star’s LA home in 1985 and rape her and a friend.

articles.title: area teen in new Disney+ series faces racist backlash - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: Leah Sava Jeffries, who formerly appeared on "Empire," will star in new Disney+ series and can be seen this summer in Idris Elba action movie.
